member.name: EXPCMDSTATE
member.summary: EXPCMDSTATE values represent the command state of a Shell item.

member.name: EXPCMDSTATE.ECS_DISABLED
member.summary: The item is unavailable. It might be displayed to the user as a dimmed, inaccessible item.

member.name: EXPCMDSTATE.ECS_CHECKBOX
member.summary: The item is displayed with a check box and that check box is not checked.

member.name: EXPCMDSTATE.ECS_CHECKED
member.summary: The item is displayed with a check box and that check box is checked. ECS_CHECKED is always returned with ECS_CHECKBOX.

member.name: EXPCMDSTATE.ECS_RADIOCHECK
member.summary: Windows 7 and later. The item is one of a group of mutually exclusive options selected through a radio button. ECS_RADIOCHECK does not imply that the item is the selected option, though it might be.
